edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class TextGridContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.TextGridContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domable

    public class TextGridContent
extends Object
implements Domable
    This class encapsulates the content of TextGridContent objects. It implements methds to set and retrieve individual characters on the grid, and to serialize and de-serialize the content from/to XML objects. It also contains information about the desired size and graphic proprties (font, colors, etc.) of the grid.
    Version:
    13.08.08
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
